headline: Will Analyst Upgrades and a New Ambassador Reset Estée Lauder’s (EL) Brand and Turnaround Narrative?
summary: In early January 2026, several research firms upgraded their views on Estée Lauder Companies and highlighted progress in its turnaround and “Beauty Reimagined” initiatives, while Zacks lifted the stock to a top rating based on rising earnings estimates through fiscal 2026. Around the same time, Estée Lauder named British actress Daisy Edgar-Jones as its newest global brand ambassador, a move that could reinforce the company’s push to reach younger consumers and refresh its brand image across...
